description: You inspire creativity by sharing your knowledge with Apple Store visitors — whether they’re first-timers or longtime loyal customers. As a Creative, you’re the foundation of the Apple Store’s welcoming environment that invites individuals to share their ideas and learn how to bring their visions to life. Those who work alongside you are knowledgeable teammates just as eager to share their skills as they are to learn more. Nothing gives you a greater thrill than empowering a customer to create something wonderful.  Both full-time and part-time jobs are available.
name: MX-Creative
